where.label: WR1
where.expression: SELF \ characterized_object . description IN [ 'cutout category' , 'fill area category' , 'inter stratum feature category' , 'stratum feature category' , 'via category' ]

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( gsa <* group_shape_aspect | NOT ( gsa \ shape_aspect . description = 'interconnect module constraint region' ) OR NOT ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pd <* USEDIN ( gsa , 'INTERCONNECT_PLACEMENT_REQUIREMENTS_MIM.' + 'PROPERTY_DEFINITION.DEFINITION' ) | NOT ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pdr <* USEDIN ( pd , 'INTERCONNECT_PLACEMENT_REQUIREMENTS_MIM.' + 'PROPERTY_DEFINITION_REPRESENTATION.DEFINITION' ) | ( 'INTERCONNECT_PLACEMENT_REQUIREMENTS_MIM.' + 'SHAPE_REPRESENTATION' IN TYPEOF ( pdr . used_representation ) ) AND ( ( 'INTERCONNECT_PLACEMENT_REQUIREMENTS_MIM.' + 'CSG_2D_SHAPE_REPRESENTATION' IN TYPEOF ( pdr . used_representation ) ) OR ( pdr . used_representation . context_of_items \ geometric_representation_context . coordinate_space_dimension = 3 ) ) ) ) = 1 ) ) ) = 0 ) ) ) = 0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( sar <* shape_aspect_relationship | ( sar \ shape_aspect_relationship . name = 'layout spacing requirement violation' ) AND ( SIZEOF ( [ 'INTERCONNECT_PLACEMENT_REQUIREMENTS_MIM.' + 'COMPONENT_TERMINAL' , 'INTERCONNECT_PLACEMENT_REQUIREMENTS_MIM.' + 'COMPONENT_INTERFACE_TERMINAL' , 'INTERCONNECT_PLACEMENT_REQUIREMENTS_MIM.' + 'STRATUM_FEATURE' ] * TYPEOF ( sar . related_shape_aspect ) ) = 0 ) ) ) = 0

where.label: WR2
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( sar <* shape_aspect_relationship | ( sar \ shape_aspect_relationship . name = 'layout spacing requirement violation' ) AND ( SIZEOF ( [ 'INTERCONNECT_PLACEMENT_REQUIREMENTS_MIM.' + 'COMPONENT_TERMINAL' , 'INTERCONNECT_PLACEMENT_REQUIREMENTS_MIM.' + 'COMPONENT_INTERFACE_TERMINAL' , 'INTERCONNECT_PLACEMENT_REQUIREMENTS_MIM.' + 'STRATUM_FEATURE' ] * TYPEOF ( sar . relating_shape_aspect ) ) = 0 ) ) ) = 0

where.label: WR3
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( sar <* shape_aspect_relationship | ( sar \ shape_aspect_relationship . name = 'layout spacing requirement violation' ) AND NOT ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( grp <* USEDIN ( sar , 'INTERCONNECT_PLACEMENT_REQUIREMENTS_MIM.' + 'PROPERTY_DEFINITION.DEFINITION' ) | ( 'INTERCONNECT_PLACEMENT_REQUIREMENTS_MIM.' + 'GROUP' IN TYPEOF ( grp ) ) AND ( grp \ group . name = 'layout spacing requirements property' ) ) ) = 1 ) ) ) = 0
